quotes.quote: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: The most disastrous thing that you can ever learn is your first programming language.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.quote: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: Programs must be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute.
quotes.author: Harold Abelson and Gerald Jay Sussman

quotes.quote: I'm convinced that about half of what separates the successful entrepreneurs from the non-successful ones is pure perseverance.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The art of debugging is figuring out what you really told your program to do rather than what you thought you told it to do.
quotes.author: Andrew Singer

quotes.quote: It is possible to make software secure, but to do so requires a level of care and dedication that few organizations are willing to invest.
quotes.author: Bruce Schneier
